https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dE9mHc6QcYxABrA6w86lJfWjXJc.jpg This short experiments with the flow of oil ink over the surface of the water. Mizue manipulated the ink by blowing with straws or stirring with toothpicks and used stop motion animation techniques to shoot the resulting effects. Blend
